title: Green Bowl Beach Discovery (Half-day)
overview: Visit this hidden gem, famous for its green waters, sea caves, and tranquil setting.

stops.description: Arrive and descend the steps to the beach, explore sea caves or swim.
Relax with a drink and enjoy the cliff views.

title: Green Bowl Adventure (Full-day)
overview: A day of swimming, cave exploration, and scenic relaxation at Green Bowl Beach.

stops.description: Swim, explore the sea caves, or relax on the sand.
Snorkel or continue exploring the area.
